fieldPrompt.product_image: Create a detailed prompt for a high-quality, appetizing food image that showcases your dish in the best light. Include specific details about lighting (natural or professional), background (clean, neutral, or styled), composition, and presentation. Focus on making the food look fresh, delicious, and irresistible to potential customers.
fieldPrompt.product_name: Enter the name of your food item (max 15 characters). Examples: Margherita Pizza, Chocolate Lava Cake, Grilled Salmon. Use descriptive, appetizing names that highlight key ingredients or cooking methods.
fieldPrompt.product_description: Write a mouth-watering description (max 70 characters) that highlights the most appealing aspects of your dish. Focus on key ingredients, cooking methods, flavors, or what makes it special. Use sensory words that make people want to try it.
fieldPrompt.price: Enter the price with currency symbol (e.g., $12.99, €9.50, ₹299). Include any special pricing, discounts, or promotional offers if applicable. Make it clear and easy to read.
fieldPrompt.cta_text: Create an enticing call-to-action (1-2 words) that encourages immediate action. Examples: Order Now, Try Today, Visit Us, Get Yours. Make it compelling and action-oriented.
fieldPrompt.theme_color: Enter a hex color code (e.g., #FF5733 for orange, #8B4513 for brown) that matches your restaurant's branding or complements the dish's colors. Choose colors that evoke appetite and align with your brand identity.
